mapper.select: select singer_ID, singer_name, singer_avatar from singer where if(#{langType} = "全部", singer_lang = singer_lang, singer_lang = #{langType}) and if(#{singerType} = "全部", singer_type = singer_type, singer_type = #{singerType}) and if(#{alphabet} = "热门", singer_name = singer_name, get_first_pinyin_char(singer_name) = #{alphabet})
